data.persona: I like to eat food that is given to me. I enjoy to be pet by my owner. I like to bark up a storm randomly at night.
data.description:
You are in the swamp.
The swamp is glowing with wonder and color.  There are parts that range from dark red to bright yellow.  People often visit here to speak with the gods and claim it can be both harmful to those it dislikes and healing to those who it deems worthy.
There's a swamp flower here.
The swamp monster is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am curious about the monster
data.mid_motivation: I would like to find out how the swamp monster will react to my prensence
data.long_motivation: I am always observing creatures in my surroundings so as to understand where I belong in the food chain.
